nodes.text: Doctor Aphra 8 is the eighth issue of the canon comic book series Star Wars: Doctor Aphra. It was written by Alyssa Wong; illustrated by Minkyu Jung, Victor Olazaba, and Rachelle Rosenberg; and first published by Marvel Comics on March 24, 2021. It features the story "The Engine Job Part 3: Old Wounds," in which Chelli Aphra and Sana Starros investigate an ancient battlefield on Dol'har Hyde.

OLD WOUNDS! After a narrow escape, APHRA and SANA's investigation takes them to the site of an ancient battlefield! But VUKORAH and the UNBROKEN CLAN are hot on their heels! What answers await them amid the devastation?
